actions.text: On agreeing to the Sewell (AL) amendment (A021) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment (A021) offered by Ms. Sewell (AL) to the Rules amendment (A001).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A021) offered by Ms. Sewell (AL) to the Rules amendment (A001).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Sewell (AL) amendment (A021) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole

amends_amendment.description: Amendment consists of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32, as amended, and which was made in order pursuant to H. Res. 507.
amends_amendment.purpose: An amendment consisting of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32 which shall be considered as pending.

description: Amendment requires a report to Congress on the Internet of Things (IoT) and its potential to improve transportation services to the elderly and persons with disabilities as well as assist local, state and federal transportation planners in achieving better inefficiencies and cost effectiveness, while protecting privacy and security of persons who use IoT technology.
purpose: An amendment numbered 21 printed in Part B of House Report 114-325 to provide a report on the Internet of Things (IoT) and its potential to improve transportation services to the elderly and persons with disabilities as well as assist local, state and federal transportation planners in achieving better inefficiencies and cost effectiveness, while protecting privacy and security of persons who use IoT technology.
